overview: A passionate note of lustful longing finds its way into all the wrong hands on the block. It works its sexual magic on everyone that reads it. only everyone that reads it is everyone but the one that Kevin wanted. Not that Kevin refuses any of them. Who would, with the like of Bill Marlowe, Lon Flexxe and a host of other horny young guys throwing themselves at his feet? and the revelation of new superstar Dick Masters as he and Beau Beaumont, the quarterback, sneak off to the sidelines, will stun you into silence. Nine sizzling guys and you makes ten and then you'll know that Ten Is Enough.
title: Ten Is Enough
